nl.helixsoft.stats

Class DataFrameOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrameOperation

  • public abstract class DataFrameOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static functions to perform complex transformations on DataFrames.

    Examples: join two dataframes (left, right, full join, inner join), convert a dataframe from long format to wide format and back (like a pivot table in Excel), and more.
